name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: The latest Samsung flagship smartphone with 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and 5000mAh battery. Features a stunning 6.8-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: Apple's premium smartphone with A17 Pro chip, titanium design, and advanced camera system. Includes Dynamic Island and always-on display technology.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancelling wireless headphones with exceptional sound quality. 30-hour battery life and premium comfort.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch M3
description: Powerful laptop with Apple M3 chip, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Perfect for professional work and creative tasks.

name: Men's Casual Cotton Shirt
description: Comfortable and stylish casual shirt made from premium cotton. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Perfect for everyday wear.

name: Women's Summer Dress
description: Elegant floral print summer dress with comfortable fit. Made from breathable fabric, perfect for warm weather.

name: Nike Air Max Sneakers
description: Classic Nike Air Max sneakers with superior cushioning and style. Durable construction and comfortable fit for all-day wear.

name: Denim Jeans - Slim Fit
description: Premium quality denim jeans with slim fit design. Comfortable stretch fabric and modern styling.

name: Maybelline Lipstick Set
description: Set of 3 long-lasting lipsticks in popular shades. Moisturizing formula with rich color payoff.

name: Face Cream - Anti Aging
description: Advanced anti-aging face cream with natural ingredients. Reduces wrinkles and improves skin texture.

name: Hair Dryer Professional
description: Professional-grade hair dryer with multiple heat settings and ionic technology. Fast drying with minimal heat damage.

name: Perfume - Oriental Essence
description: Luxury perfume with long-lasting oriental fragrance. Premium quality with elegant packaging.

name: Sofa Set - 3 Seater
description: Comfortable 3-seater sofa set with premium fabric upholstery. Modern design perfect for living room.

name: Dining Table Set
description: Elegant dining table set for 6 people. Made from solid wood with durable finish.

name: LED Smart TV 55 inch
description: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with built-in streaming apps. HDR support and stunning picture quality.

name: Kitchen Blender
description: Powerful 1000W blender with multiple speed settings. Perfect for smoothies, soups, and more.
